name: Labindia Instruments Private Limited
tag_list: dissolution-test-apparatus, melting-range-apparatus, titrators, automatic-titrators, ph-meters, conductivity-meters, spectrophotometer, tablet-testers, gas-chromatograph
overview:
We are primarily engaged in providing comprehensive solutions not only in the selection of instruments but also provide complete application support. We at Labindia, strive hard to strengthen the bond with our customers through effectively offering uncompromisable standards of customer service including sales and after sales support. This has helped us to achieve the status of â€œpreferred solution providerâ€ to a large number of laboratories in India engaged in Research, Quality Control, Process etc.etc.

In the market place that demands 24 x 7 response, we have invested significantly to stock in spare parts to provide immediate after sales service.We also provide training to our customers. Our state-of-the-art application laboratory and training center in Gurgaon facility and Thane factory is a testimony to the commitment. We have proficiency programs on both routine operations and advanced techniques. Our range includes test apparatus, laboratory spectrophotometer, laboratory titrators, tap density meter, dissolution test apparatus, melting range apparatus, titrators, automatic titrators, ph meters and many more.
